SEARCH
Package com.raylib.jextract

Class rlRenderBatch

java.lang.Object
com.raylib.jextract.rlRenderBatch
public class rlRenderBatch extends Object
struct rlRenderBatch {
    int bufferCount;
    int currentBuffer;
    rlVertexBuffer *vertexBuffer;
    rlDrawCall *draws;
    int drawCounter;
    float currentDepth;
}
